scripts.build-ios: rm -rf ios/ android/ && react-native eject && rm -rf ./ios/IAHSPConference/Base.lproj && cp -r ./assets/ios/IAHSPConference/Base.lproj ./ios/IAHSPConference/Base.lproj && rm -rf ./ios/IAHSPConference/Images.xcassets && cp -r ./assets/ios/IAHSPConference/Images.xcassets ./ios/IAHSPConference/Images.xcassets && react-native link
